explains: n. 番茄，西红柿；番茄红，鲜红色；番茄植株；番茄，西红柿
wordGroup: tomato sauce 番茄酱，蕃茄汁；番茄沙司
tomato paste 蕃茄酱，西红柿酱；蕃茄糊
tomato puree 蕃茄糊；蕃茄酱

sentences.en: It's similar in size to a tomato.
The tomato hit the wall with a splat.
sentences.cn: 西红柿啪的一声打在墙上。

sentences.en: Norman cut open his pie and squirted tomato sauce into it.
sentences.cn: 诺曼切开他的馅饼，往里面挤了番茄酱。
